snippet: Coach Andy Reid announced Wednesday that Michael Vick will remain the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Philadelphia Eagles coach Andy Reid announces that, despite struggling this season, Michael Vick will remain starting quarterback; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Coach Andy Reid announced Wednesday that Michael Vick will remain the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles.

headline.main: Vick Will Continue Starting for Eagles
headline.print_headline: Vick Will Continue Starting for Eagles
